events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this case promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the problem?
Sure, my order number is 45781239, and I have attached a picture showing the wrong product that was delivered.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and clear information. I appreciate your help resolving this.
The refund case has been closed as the refund process has been initiated successfully.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund was received yesterday. Everything is perfect now, thank you very much!
Closing the case as the customer has confirmed receipt of the refund and expressed satisfaction.
